name: ConditionalButton
desc: The object for defining a button component's conditional properties, and when the conditional properties are in effect.

items.name: conditions
items.desc: An instance or array of conditions that, when met, cause the conditional component properties to take effect.

items.name: anchor
items.desc: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

items.name: animation
items.desc: An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.To remove a previously set condition, use none.

items.name: behavior
items.desc: An object that defines behavior for a component, like Parallax or Springy.

items.name: hidden
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

items.name: layout
items.desc: An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document.If layout is not defined, size and position are based on various factors, such as the device type, the length of the content, and the role of this component.

items.name: style
items.desc: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.

items.name: textStyle
items.desc: An inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a ComponentTextStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.
